Actor Born Clifford Parker Robertson III on Sept. 9, 1923 in La Jolla, CA

Robertson appeared to be on his way after President Kennedy personally approved him to star in âPT 109,â the 1963 film about Kennedyâs heroic World War II exploits in the Navy as a motor torpedo boat skipper in the South Pacific.
